job.title: Salesforce Informatica Data Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Computer & Network Security
job.description: ltstronggtltugtSummaryltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtThe Salesforce Informatica Data Engineer will design intelligent automated data integrations Bring highperformance zero code cloud and onprem data integration to scaleltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtDUTIESltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtDesign intelligent automated data integrationsltligtltligtBring highperformance zero code cloud and onpremises data integration to scale ltligtltligtBy scaling up the data ecosystem around Salesforce we will improve speed and lower the total cost of ownership with data integrationltligtltligtImplement scalable solutions that handle large amounts of data through ETL migration integration and implementation of userfriendly interfaces leveraging Salesforce adaptors and secure agent deploymentsltligtltligtYou will improve business process agility and outcomes drive innovation and reduce time to market for our innovative IT solutionsltligtltligtYou will work closely with Salesforce Administrators and DevelopersltligtltligtYou will also be engaged in our strategic project integrationsltligtltulgt ltstronggtREQUIREMENTSltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtBachelors Degreeltligtltligt6 years relevant professional experienceltligtltligt3 years of recent Informatica Cloud ETL and Salesforce  Informatica integrations experienceltligtltligtCertifications in Salesforce and Informatica preferredltligtltulgt
